title: Coursera Sees Women Studying Online to Change Careers
itunes:title: Coursera Sees Women Studying Online to Change Careers
description:
Dr. Emily Glassberg Sands, Vice President of Data Science at Coursera, discusses the online education platform's Women and Skills Report.

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Sonali Basak. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
